long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect your Steam account with Steam Scam Guard, a powerful extension designed to identify and warn you if the website you're attempting to log into is not the official Steam community. Safeguard your credentials and stay secure from phishing scams and fraudulent sites that mimic Steam's login page.

Key Features:

Real-time Protection: Automatically checks the URL to ensure it's a legitimate Steam login page.
Instant Alerts: Changes the extension icon and displays a warning if a potential scam site is detected.
User-Friendly Interface: Simple popup with essential information and warnings.
Customizable Notifications: Receive browser notifications about potential threats.
Powered by playforstake.com: Developed with a focus on user security and privacy.
How It Works:

Monitors URLs and checks for the official Steam login prefix: https://steamcommunity.com/.
Scans for Steam login elements and keywords on the page.
Alerts you with icon changes and warning popups if a suspicious site is detected.
Privacy Policy:
Steam Scam Guard does not collect, store, or share any personal data. It only uses the necessary permissions to analyze URLs and page content to protect you from scams.

Disclaimer:
We are not associated with Steam or Valve Corporation. Steam Scam Guard is an independent security tool developed to enhance your online safety.

Support:
For support and feedback, visit playforstake.com or contact us on https://twitter.com/playforstake
